original_text: After him, Judas the Galilean appeared in the days of the census and led a band of people in revolt. He too was killed, and all his followers were scattered.
korean_text: 그 후 호적할 때에 갈릴리의 유다가 일어나 백성을 꾀어 따르게 하다가 그도 망한즉 따르던 모든 사람들이 흩어졌느니라

sentences.original_text: After him, Judas the Galilean appeared
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 유다 갈릴리 사람이 나타났습니다

sentences.original_text: in the days of the census
and led a band of people
and all his followers were scattered
